snippet: Ghulam Faijullaha Fahim, who was being held in an attack on a teacher, was hit by crossfire when officers took him to help capture his associates, a police chief said.
lead_paragraph: Ghulam Faijullaha Fahim, who was being held in an attack on a teacher, was hit by crossfire when officers took him to help capture his associates, a police chief said.

headline.main: Crossfire Kills Bangladesh Assault Suspect in Custody, Police Say
